section_features.title: Where is your data stored?
section_features.description: A [Datasource](https://docs.greatexpectations.io/en/latest/reference/core_concepts/datasource.html), facilitates access for Great Expectations to data to be validated.

section_features.title: What batch kwargs generators do you want to use?
section_features.description: A Batch Kwargs Generator provides an interface for interacting with a datasource to introspect it and slice data into logical batches.

section_features.title: What validation engine(s) do you want to use?
section_features.description: A [Validation Engine](https://docs.greatexpectations.io/en/latest/reference/core_concepts/validation_engine.html) provides the compute resources necessary to evaluate expectations on raw data as provided by a data connection.

section_features.title: Where do you want to store and share your expectations?
section_features.description: An [Expectations Store](https://docs.greatexpectations.io/en/latest/reference/core_concepts/data_context.html#expectations_store) provides a way to store Expectation Suites accessible to a Data Context.

section_features.title: Where do you want to store validation results?
section_features.description: A [Validations Store](https://docs.greatexpectations.io/en/latest/reference/core_concepts/data_context.html#validations_store) manages Validation Results to ensure they are accessible via a Data Context for review and rendering into Data Docs.

section_features.title: How do you want to host and share your Data Documentation?
section_features.description: A [HTML Site Store](https://docs.greatexpectations.io/en/latest/reference/core_concepts/data_context.html) facilitates publishing rendered documentation built from Expectation Suites, Profiling Results, and Validation Results

section_features.title: How do you want to trigger validation?
section_features.description: A [Checkpoint](https://docs.greatexpectations.io/en/latest/guides/how_to_guides/validation/how_to_run_a_checkpoint_in_python.html) makes it possible to easily integrate a validation step into your workflow.

section_features.title: What operating systems do your development team and data infrastructure use?
section_features.description: Operating system related dependencies and testing are reflected in our assessment of the maturity of support indicated here.
